content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: cut_red_sandstone_slab
inventory=[{"type": "quartz_pillar", "quantity": 25, "index": 23}, {"type": "gray_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "end_crystal", "quantity": 8, "index": 33}, {"type": "birch_pressure_plate", "quantity": 41, "index": 44}, {"type": "cut_red_sandstone", "quantity": 3, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft the cut_red_sandstone_slab I need to place 3 cut_red_sandstone in the crafting grid, and since I have 3 of them in slot 45, I will move 1 of them to slot 1.
act: move from slot 45 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: cut_red_sandstone_slab
inventory=[{"type": "cut_red_sandstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "quartz_pillar", "quantity": 25, "index": 23}, {"type": "gray_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "end_crystal", "quantity": 8, "index": 33}, {"type": "birch_pressure_plate", "quantity": 41, "index": 44}, {"type": "cut_red_sandstone", "quantity": 2, "index": 45}]
thought: Since I already have 1 cut_red_sandstone in the crafting grid, I will move the second one to slot 2.
act: move from slot 45 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: cut_red_sandstone_slab
inventory=[{"type": "cut_red_sandstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "cut_red_sandstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "quartz_pillar", "quantity": 25, "index": 23}, {"type": "gray_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "end_crystal", "quantity": 8, "index": 33}, {"type": "birch_pressure_plate", "quantity": 41, "index": 44}, {"type": "cut_red_sandstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: Since I already have 2 cut_red_sandstone in the crafting grid, I will move the third one to slot 3.
act: move from slot 45 to slot 3 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: cut_red_sandstone_slab
inventory=[{"type": "cut_red_sandstone_slab", "quantity": 6, "index": 0}, {"type": "cut_red_sandstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "cut_red_sandstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "cut_red_sandstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "quartz_pillar", "quantity": 25, "index": 23}, {"type": "gray_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "end_crystal", "quantity": 8, "index": 33}, {"type": "birch_pressure_plate", "quantity": 41, "index": 44}]
thought: Since I have now crafted the cut_red_sandstone_slab, I will move it from the crafting slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 6
